title: How do I migrate to a new phone without my old phone?
content:
If the data on their Web site is correct, T-Mobile is offering a $400 trade in for a Pixel 1 on a $400 Pixel 3a.

If I take the deal, I'll presumably have to give them my old phone in exchange for the new one.

How can I get the stuff that's not been automatically backed up to Drive from the old Pixel onto a 3a?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
